com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.exceptionhandler

Class DefaultRestErrorResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.exceptionhandler.DefaultRestErrorResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RestErrorResolver, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware

    public class DefaultRestErrorResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements RestErrorResolver, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Default RestErrorResolver implementation that converts discovered Exceptions to RestError instances.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
